mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, DATE_FORMAT(a.get_time,'%Y-%m-%d') getTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') createTime, a.enclosure, b.user_name userName, b.job_number jobNumber, b.state, d.`name` languageTypeName, e.`name` levelName FROM sys_staff_language a LEFT JOIN sys_staff_data_dictionary d ON a.language_id = d.id LEFT JOIN sys_staff_language_level e ON a.level_id = e.id, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.staff_id = b.id
AND b.user_name LIKE '%${userName}%'
AND b.job_number LIKE '%${jobNumber}%'
AND b.state = #{state}
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
